extendedInfo.description: vibrator is a safe way to control the use of your Android powered deviceâs vibrations.  While producing nice sensations, vibrator makes sure that the continuous running of the micro-shaker does not exhaust your battery or over-heat your device. vibrator is simple to use, yet offers powerful features like the ability to create unlimited different patterns of pulsating, shaking fun.   Niceties include a link to play music, an advanced option allows you to run the vibrations in the background; for instance, you might watch a video, play solitaire, or surf the web while using vibrator.WHY VIBRATOR ?There are many apps available to make your device jiggle!  Here is vibratorâs list of pleasurable features:1. HARDWARE SAFETY FEATURES:* Monitors device temperature while running.  vibrator automatically stops if temperatures exceed a safe zone* Measures battery capacity.  vibrator automatically stops if you are running off the battery and it falls below safe power level2. CONVENIENCE FEATURES:* Uncluttered display of controls without useless distractions or silly backgrounds* 4 preset vibrating patterns including continuous/always-on* Adjustable controls to create unlimited additional patterns above and beyond the 4 presets* Built-in button to select and play music* Although itâs intuitive user interface makes it unlikely to be needed, there is quick help with full instructions* The layout of controls automatically adjusts to both very small and very large screens. What ever your device, vibrator looks, works, and feels great.* All settings, from simple to advanced, are retained between uses (for instance if you are interrupted by a phone call).3. ADVANCED FEATURES:* Once launched, vibrator lets you tell it to run continuously in the background.  You can surf the web, watch a YouTube video, run a chat program while the vibrator in your device buzzes along. Instant stop and control is always available via Androidâs Notification bar.OTHER NOTES:Use vibrator as an entertaining way to joke with friends. It is great for temple massages, relaxing muscles and relieving headaches.  The power or strength of the vibrations are limited by the device hardware not this software, if it were possible to change the overall intensity of the vibes, the program would have a control for it!

reviews.comment: The best! Was running while charging and it turned itself off due to battery gettin hot. Glad it won\'t fry phone like the free one! Get whacha pay fo!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I got this when I injured my hand playing softball. It really helped. Now that my hand is better, my gf insists that I keep it on phone for her.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a GREAT app! Shows battery usage icon & allows you to pick & choose different vibrations. Love the music options too! Good times!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is no better than all the free ones available in the market. Kinda sucks, but I did give it two stars because it works, just nothing special.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great if your disabled
